page.title: 11LAW AND ORDER part 1
page.content: The Police in South Norwood are good community police as they get to know their area and the people living in it. There is also a scheme of Schools/police liason officers. Each officer has to deal with many schools in his area and build up a relationship with them. He teaches them a little bit about the law, organises police quizzes between schools, and shows children that the police are there to help. The police liason officer for my school said he wanted to be a policeman becauses he wanted to help people. They also show films about police work.
